name: part_002
file: tmp_【#TheBrokenPromise】hololive English -Promise- 1st Anniversary Musical： The Broken Promise [Oi0WDyT6xTE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive English -Promise- perform the song 'ANNIVERSARY' on a tavern-themed stage.
The performance ends and the stage transitions from a tavern to a forest at night with a campfire.
The members rest by a campfire in the forest and exchange banter.
Mumei begins to sing a new song under the moonlight.

subtitles.original: (諦めない強さなら)
subtitles.english: (If it's the strength to not give up)

subtitles.original: (明日が見えないのなら)
subtitles.english: (If tomorrow cannot be seen)

subtitles.original: 僕らは 迷ってた 真っ暗 狭い部屋
subtitles.english: We were lost in a pitch-black, narrow room

subtitles.original: 僕らは あがいてた 光 差すほう
subtitles.english: We were struggling towards where the light shines

subtitles.original: 不安や しがらみは 大きく膨らんで
subtitles.english: Anxiety and entanglements grew larger

subtitles.original: 襲いかかる 逃げ場はない 差し伸べる手も
subtitles.english: Attacking us, there's no escape, nor a hand reached out

subtitles.original: 嫌というほどに 繰り返して
subtitles.english: Repeating to a sickening degree

subtitles.original: それでも まだまだ 与えるのか
subtitles.english: Even so, will you still give more?

subtitles.original: 試練の日々よ
subtitles.english: Oh, days of trial

subtitles.original: 諦めない強さなら それなりに平等だけど
subtitles.english:
If it's the strength to not give up,
it's somewhat equal

subtitles.original: 振り絞ったよ 今にもダメになりそう
subtitles.english:
I've squeezed it all out,
I'm about to break right now

subtitles.original: そんなとき ふと見上げた 先駆者たちの言葉には
subtitles.english:
At such times, in the words of the pioneers
I happened to look up at

subtitles.original: 同じ香り 感じたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt the same scent

subtitles.original: 僕らは 夢を見た さまざま 思い思い
subtitles.english: We dreamed various, individual dreams

subtitles.original: 僕らは 賭けてみた お互いに全て
subtitles.english: We tried betting everything on each other

subtitles.original: 勝率や現実 ときには振り払って
subtitles.english: Shaking off the odds and reality at times

subtitles.original: 泣けばいい 悔めばいい 途中経過さ
subtitles.english:
It's okay to cry, it's okay to regret,
it's just a process

subtitles.original: 夢中で 息荒く 走り続け
subtitles.english: Continuing to run breathlessly in a daze

subtitles.original: 気づけば 無数の 仲間たちに
subtitles.english: Realizing that to the countless comrades

subtitles.original: 支えられながら
subtitles.english: While being supported

subtitles.original: 明日がみえないのなら その方角は間違いさ
subtitles.english: If tomorrow cannot be seen, that direction is wrong

subtitles.original: 一呼吸おいて ゼロからの近道もある
subtitles.english:
Take a breath,
there's also a shortcut from zero

subtitles.original: 簡単じゃないことでも 複雑に絡まる前に
subtitles.english:
Even things that aren't easy,
before they get tangled complexly

subtitles.original: どうか一度 見せにおいで
subtitles.english: Please come and show me once

subtitles.original: 出会ったんだ
subtitles.english: We met

subtitles.original: 魅かれたんだ
subtitles.english: We were enchanted

subtitles.original: それが奇跡
subtitles.english: That's a miracle

subtitles.original: 君にありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you to you

subtitles.original: きっと諦めない強さなら それなりに平等だけど
subtitles.english:
Surely if it's the strength to not give up,
it's somewhat equal

subtitles.original: 振り絞ったよ 今にもダメになりそう
subtitles.english:
I've squeezed it all out,
I'm about to break right now

subtitles.original: そんなとき ふと見上げた 先駆者たちの言葉には
subtitles.english:
At such times, in the words of the pioneers
I happened to look up at

subtitles.original: 頼らない 歌うよ
subtitles.english: I won't rely on them, I'll sing

subtitles.original: 明日が見えないのなら その方角は間違いさ
subtitles.english: If tomorrow cannot be seen, that direction is wrong

subtitles.original: 一呼吸おいて ゼロからの近道もある
subtitles.english:
Take a breath,
there's also a shortcut from zero

subtitles.original: 簡単じゃないことでも 複雑に絡まる前に
subtitles.english:
Even things that aren't easy,
before they get tangled complexly

subtitles.original: どうか一度 見せにおいで
subtitles.english: Please come and show me once

subtitles.original: Quite the jig ye have danced back at the tavern.
subtitles.english: Quite the jig ye have danced back at the tavern.

subtitles.original: Was it to charm people or to scare away crows? I couldn't tell.
subtitles.english: Was it to charm people or to scare away crows? I couldn't tell.

subtitles.original: A brazen stone to cast when none would countenance you without your magic.
subtitles.english: A brazen stone to cast when none would countenance you without your magic.

subtitles.original: You're both very charming.
subtitles.english: You're both very charming.

subtitles.original: But not as lovely as Namu.
subtitles.english: But not as lovely as Namu.

subtitles.original: Huh?
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: Lovely you say?
subtitles.english: Lovely you say?

subtitles.original: Is the moon not beautiful...
subtitles.english: Is the moon not beautiful...
